name: FaceFX In-Game Animation Set File
summary: Learn about .ANIMSET_INGAME files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ANIMSET_INGAME files are run using the FaceFX SDK, a software component that enables game engines to execute FaceFX animations in their respective games.

description: Animation file used by FaceFX, an application used for designing facial expressions for video games; saves a stripped down version of an .ANIMSET file suitable for use in the target game; removes all non-essential data so that the animation is run efficiently by FaceFX.
